name: Memory Leap
description:
"I feel as though I've been to this place so many times before and yet I never quite know what to expect when I arrive."

Jump into Memory Leap and absorb yourself in dreamlike rooms that will require some out of the box thinking to escape.

Use right mouse click to blink and watch the world around you change and distort. Left mouse button will lock some objects within the physical realm.

This game was created as part of the Jamfuser 2020 Game Jam. The theme for this year’s jam was ‘Leap’. We wanted to create a very weird and unique experience that was hard to solve but rewarding once worked out.
